General.Name: Zhefu Holding Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhefu Holding Group Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the research and development, manufacture, installation, and service of hydropower equipment in China and internationally. It offers turbine and pumped storage generator sets; undertakes general contract works for hydropower projects; and undertakes general contract works for electromechanical equipment of power stations. The company also provides nuclear power equipment, such as control rod drive mechanisms and other civil nuclear safety machinery and equipment, special maintenance tools for nuclear power, three waste treatment/transfer equipment, nuclear auxiliary system equipment, nuclear fuel auxiliary equipment, special mechanical and electrical equipment, etc. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Fuchunjiang Hydropower Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhefu Holding Group Co., Ltd. in January 2014. Zhefu Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

6.Name: Mr. Zhen Wu  Fang
6.Title: Sec., Deputy Gen. Mang. & Non-Independent Director
